pageProduct.name: S26 Gold Alula DelicateEze 850g
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

S-26 Alula Gold DelicateEze is a unique formulation for delicate tummies to help ease constipation and colic.

S-26 Alula Gold DelicateEze is a premium, nutritionally complete, speciality infant formula for babies from birth with delicate tummies who may experience digestive discomfort from time to time. It is formulated to aid digestive malabsorption with an enriched level of sn-2 palmitate to help ease constipation (soften stools) and a reduced* level of lactose to help ease colic.

The protein source of S-26 Alula Gold DelicateEze infant formula is 100% whey partially hydrolysed, broken down, protein from cow's milk.
It continues to support your baby through the time when solids are being introduced at around 6 months, as a well-balanced diet is important.

*compared to our standard infant formulas.

Not recommended for infants with cow's milk protein allergy or lactose intolerance.

As it is a specialty formula, consultation with a healthcare professional is recommended before use to ensure S-26 Alula Gold DelicateEze is suitable for your baby.

Not suitable for general use and should be used under medical supervision.

Suitable For: Suitable from birth

Product Claims: The protein source of S-26 GOLD DELICATEEZE Infant Formula is 100% whey partially hydrolysed protein from cow's milk.

Size: 850g

Serving Size: 12.8g

Servings Per Pack: 70

Serving Suggestion: Feeding Guide
0-2 weeks: 60ml pre-boiled water, 1 level scoop of powder, suggested feeds per day - 7-9
2 weeks - 3 months: 120ml pre-boiled water, 2 level scoops of powder, feeds per day - 6
3-6 months: 180ml pre-boiled water, 3 level scoops of powder, feeds per day - 5
6-12 months: 180ml pre-boiled water, 3 level scoops of powder, feeds per day - 4-5
Over 12 months: 180ml pre-boiled water, 3 level scoops of powder, feeds per day - 3

Your baby may need more or less than indicated. Ideally, formula should be prepared just prior to feeding. Otherwise, refrigerate prepared formula and use within 24 hours. From 6 months, infants should be offered solid food in addition to this formula.

Warnings

FOLLOW INSTRUCTIONS EXACTLY.
PREPARE BOTTLES AND TEATS AS DIRECTED.
DO NOT CHANGE PROPORTIONS OF POWDER
EXCEPT ON MEDICAL ADVICE. INCORRECT
PREPARATION CAN MAKE YOUR BABY VERY ILL.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

BREAST MILK IS BEST FOR BABIES.
BEFORE YOU DECIDE TO USE THIS PRODUCT,
CONSULT YOUR DOCTOR OR HEALTH WORKER
FOR ADVICE.

Ingredients

Lactose, vegetable oils (including esterified and soybean), partially
hydrolysed whey protein, maltodextrin, corn syrup solids, emulsifier (soy
lecithin), long-chain polyunsaturated fatty acid from single-cell sources
[arachidonic acid (AA) and docosahexaenoic acid (DHA)], L-histidine,
L-tyrosine, taurine, nucleotides (cytidine-5'-monophosphate, disodium
uridine-5'-monophosphate, adenosine-5'-monophosphate, disodium
inosine-5'-monophosphate, disodium guanosine-5'-monophosphate),
L-carnitine, antioxidants (mixed tocopherols concentrate, ascorbyl
palmitate), lutein.
Minerals: Calcium, chloride, potassium, phosphorus, sodium, magnesium,
iron, zinc, copper, iodine, manganese, selenium.
Vitamins: Vitamin C, choline, inositol, vitamin E, niacin, pantothenic acid,
vitamin A, vitamin B2, vitamin B1, beta-carotene, vitamin B6, vitamin D, folic
acid, vitamin K, biotin, vitamin B12.

Contains: Contains milk and soy.

Directions

1. Always wash and dry hands before preparing formula. Wash bottles, teats and caps.
2. After washing, sterilise by boiling for 5 minutes. Keep bottles capped until use.
3. Boil fresh drinking water for 5 minutes. Allow boiled water to cool to lukewarm. Consult FEEDING GUIDE for quantities
of water and formula.
4. Prepare each bottle individually. Pour in required amount of lukewarm water.
5. Fill the scoop with S-26 GOLD DELICATEEZE and level off on the side of the can. Only the enclosed scoop should be used. Always add 1 scoop (8.6g) per 60mL water.
6. Cap bottle and shake. Test temperature on wrist before feeding. Formula left in the bottle after a feed must be discarded.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

• Do not use if seal is broken.
• Always replace plastic lid after use.
• Store can in a cool, dry place (e.g. pantry).
• Avoid prolonged storage at excessive temperatures.
• Use contents of can within 4 weeks of opening.
• Use By date and Batch Code are located on the base
of this can.
• Fill is by weight, not volume.
• Some settling of the powder may occur.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
